sub_title: Partner Network Developer for United Kingdom | Denmark | Ireland
summary: TRAVIS Road Services is the biggest and fastest-growing European booking platform for essential road services such as truck parking, truck washing, tank cleaning, and truck & trailer repairs in over 18 European countries. Our network consists of more than 1,700 + road service locations and over 400,000 + unique registered lorries who are actively finding, booking, and paying for their road services in over 18 European countries. Find, Book, and Pay, it's that's easy!

treasury_media.title: The Rocket Ship called TRAVIS - TRAVIS Road Services
TRAVIS Road Services for Service Partners
treasury_media.description: By joining the TRAVIS Road Services network, your location will be visible and available for booking on Europe’s largest booking platform for essential road services. Our network consists of more than 1,200+ road service locations (secured parking locations, truck washes, service repair stations, and tank cleaning stations) and over 250,000+ unique registered lorries who are actively finding, booking, and paying for their road services in over 18 European countries.

profile_positions.description:
I own and manage the growth and development of TRAVIS Road Services network, by connecting notable service locations such as Lorry Parks, Truck Washes, Tank Cleaning Depot Locations, and Truck Repair companies in the United Kingdom and Ireland.

By connecting all these Service Locations not just in the UK but across Europe, we develop a deep understanding of their needs and work closely together to provide the ultimate solution required by our international fleet customers who use TRAVIS Road Services for their efficient fleet management. Our network is continually built on strong relationships by providing these Service Locations with continuous innovation, accessibility from our international customer base, dedicated multi-lingual support, and data to take their business to the next level. 

Find, Book, and Pay. It's that easy!
profile_positions.title: Account Executive Partner Network in United Kingdom

profile_positions.description:
Dentsu International's Digital Centre of Excellence runs digital campaigns for global advertisers in over 50+ markets around the world. More than 50 professionals drive branding and performance KPI’s over several channels like social advertising and programmatic campaigns. 

As Global Account Manager within the Digital Center of Excellence of Dentsu Aegis, I owned and managed assigned FMCG accounts across Tier 1 and Tier 2 global markets (Spain, Italy, Baltics, and Thailand) in creating strategic digital Search, Social, and Programmatic campaigns and optimizing data-derived results. I managed overall market communication and ensured projects and plans were delivered on target and on time and within budget for each campaign and maintained relationships with media owners, media agencies, and advertisers in EMEA countries.
profile_positions.title: Global Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
Blackpearl Media Inc. is a full-service, Strategic Communications Agency that is driven by a goal to creatively connect brands to their market through relevant stories that enrich consumer experience.

- Achieved strong brand engagement between consumers and key client accounts by preparing cogent, communication media plans with tactical content and media placement on various traditional and digital channels for distribution.
- Executed core tasks relating to contract negotiation, tailoring proposals, overseeing total campaign costs, monitoring spends and earnings, and administering billable hours to key client accounts.
- Prospected for new clients and leads via networking and cold calling, building a pipeline of potential business opportunities for the agency.
- Secured and onboarded a major client account; successfully transitioning their marketing strategy from traditional to digital marketing
- Assured client satisfaction and managed expectations within set timeframes throughout the duration of marketing communication campaigns.
- Prolonged rapport with key client accounts by exploring their specific needs and anticipating new opportunities for them.
profile_positions.title: Senior Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
GOBO is a full-service advertising, design, and thinking agency dedicated to producing big results for clients located in the central Makati Business District of Manila, Philippines.

- Worked alongside the Senior Account Manager in briefing the creative team and yielded input with the ideation and strategic planning of marketing communication campaigns.
- Monitored and reviewed the current market landscape of clients and analyzed their existing efforts identifying quantitive and qualitative data to aid in developing the communication strategy for clients
- Keeping track of the effectiveness of implemented campaigns, presenting results alongside Agency colleagues (particularly the Senior Account Manager) 
- Prepared and facilitated the process of sales and promotion permits of clients from the Food and Drug Administration Philippines.

Clients handled:
• Watsons Philippines
• SM Supermarket 
• Allphones
profile_positions.title: Account Executive

profile_positions.description:
New World Makati Hotel is a deluxe, five-star hotel located in the central Makati Business District of Manila, Philippines.

- Providing guests with exceptional customer service procedures adhering to the well-known standards of all New World hotels worldwide
- Dealing with unexpected occurrences and guest-related concerns within the Front Office and all the involved departments of the hotel
- Responding to telephone queries and drafted routine correspondence as required
profile_positions.title: Front Office - Service Center Associate

company.name: ABRACADABRA Film and Video Production House

profile_positions.company: ABRACADABRA Film and Video Production House
profile_positions.description:
ABRACADABRA Film and Video Production House is a production company that produces television commercials, digital content, and television shows in Makati City, Philippines. As an intern, I am mainly responsible for:

- Liaising with advertising agencies, production houses, and media-related agencies to ensure that everyone involved in a project or campaign is updated with their schedules and status
- Assisted with all logistics and supply-related responsibilities for client-agency-production house meetings
- Accomplished time sheets and expedited receipts for turnover with the Finance department
profile_positions.title: Intern / Production Assistant
